Health Tips: Stay hydrated and rest well. Avoid close contact with others to prevent spreading the flu.
Isolate yourself and monitor your symptoms. Follow public health guidelines for COVID-19. Seek medical attention if you have trouble breathing.
Maintain a regular sleep schedule and avoid stress.
Reduce salt intake in your diet. Engage in regular physical activity. Monitor your blood pressure regularly and take prescribed medications.
Avoid exposure to allergens and irritants. Use inhalers as prescribed by your doctor. Develop an asthma action plan with your healthcare provider.
